DOC.brief_summary: The investigator examine feasibility acceptability non-restrictive diet focus increase dietary fiber lean protein weight loss . Fifteen obese adult enrol 12-week assessment include 6 bi-weekly individual dietary counseling session attain daily goal high fiber ( > 35 g/day ) lean protein ( 0.8 g per kilogram/day individual 's ideal body weight ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants instructed increase dietary fiber intake 35 g/day protein intake 0.8 g per kilogram/day ideal body weight . Loss 5 % body weight consider achieve weight-loss goal . The intervention include 6 bi-weekly , 30-minute individual dietary counseling session 12-weeks . Behavioral strategy include self-monitoring , problem solving , goal setting , stimulus control , food substitution , relapse prevention teach assist participant meet fiber protein goal .
DOC.criteria: 1. interested lose weight body mass index ( BMI ) 3045 kg/m2 ; 2. age 21 70 ; 3. able provide inform consent ; 4. physician 's approval his/her patient participate ; 5. nonsmoker ( give nicotine 's effect weight suppression , HDL , smoke cessation 's effect weight 1. clinically diagnose diabetes , HbA1c â‰¥ 6.5 % ; 2. acute coronary event within previous 6 month ; 3. pregnant lactating ; 4. plan move area within 12week study period ; 5. diagnosis medical condition precludes adherence study dietary recommendation ( e.g. , inflammatory bowel disease , active diverticulitis , renal disease ) ; 6. follow lowcarbohydrate , highfat dietary regimen Atkins ' Diet participate weight loss program ; 7. previously bariatric surgery ; 8. currently use weight loss medication ; 9. diagnosis eat disorder ( anorexia nervosa , bulimia nervosa binge eat ) ; 10. unable provide consent .
